resources.string: 1. Wifi is one of the most, if not THE most, popular wireless access medium around. Currently, there are two standard bandwidths at which they operate: 2.4GHz and 5GHZ. Of these two, which has shorter range?
2. Tell me now, which of these 3 wireless technologies can pass through walls? (Multiple Choice)
3. Which of these Bluetooth Classes are most commonly used in Cellular Devices? Class 1, Class 2, or Class 3?
4. Which of these wireless radio technologies is the fastest?
